ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: half of it, or a little less,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: A half of it or a little less
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: half of it, or reduce it a little;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Worship Him) for more or less than half of the night
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: For half the night, or reduce some from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Half of it or less than that, a little.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Half of it, or lessen it a little,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: (a half of it, or diminish a little,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: A half thereof, or abate a little thereof
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It may be half the night or a little less than that
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: A half thereof, or abate a little thereof,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: a half, or reduce a little from that
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Half of it,- or a little less,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Half of it, or a little less than that,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: half the night, or a little less
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: For half of it, or reduce it a little.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Half of it - or subtract from it a little
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [73:3] a half of it (nisfahu substitutes for qalīlan, with ‘little’ [being little by] taking into account the whole [night]), or reduce of it, of the half, a little, up to a third,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: He explained further, saying: (A half thereof) i.e. pray during half of the night, (or abate a little thereof) less than half and up to a third of the night,
